Name: Handyman
About the game: Handyman is a game where you have to lead a one-man repair and cleaning team. The main tasks are set by the customer, but what methods to achieve them - you can decide for yourself! Each completed task will bring you a certain amount of money, for which in the next order it will be possible to do something that would not have been enough initially. For example, hang a new chandelier, and not just screw in a light bulb. You, as a worker, are not limited by anything: you can simply make cosmetic repairs, or you can break some walls and build new ones where you see fit. List of your best friends for lead time: - Roller, for painting any surfaces - Hammer, to create the passages you need - Mop and hose, to remove unclean deeds of customers - Tablet, to buy any object from any part of the world - Lawn mower to mow the dense thickets of some customers - Spatula and bricks to create new partitions - A shovel to clean up age-old landfills - As well as your hands and head to carry objects and choose the best ways to solve the tasks And now it's time to finally establish your team, from one person! Have fun.
